title: ADi ashaindu varuginrAn kaNNan
sahitya:
ADi ashaindu varuginrAn kaNNan ADi shaindu varuginrAn


anupallavi

  nIDiya tAmarai vizhigaL mella niddiraik-koLLavE enravai sholla 
vADiya mEniyO ingangum taLLa vAvenrazhaitta rAdhai pOvenru shinam koLLa


caraNam 1    vAi mozhiyO kETTAl uLLam koLLai koNDAccu vADaiyO maNam candanap-pUccu
EittaruLum pollA vESamum Accu engE tAraLam enrAl pin pakkamum pOccu
    caraNam 2    kannattilE veghu kumkumap-poTTugal adu kAduvarayil pUccidiTTukkaL 
munnE pinnE nIr viyarvai shoTTugaL mOhanap-pEccukkuLLE muDiya urai kaTTugaL
    caraNam 3    ittanai azhaginukkum mElE Eni vaittu eTTinArppOlE 
vaitta Or shiTrADai tOl mElE vENumenru Ar tandadO mElum uravAlE
